title: First of 3 - champion concept - exodus the balance breaker
body:
Born to a solari father and lunari mother he became embued with the power of the sun and the moon, due to the war between the solari and lunari he was quickly exiled at age of 7 and forced never to return and upon his leaving his parents were quickly executed meaning he was alone throughout his exile he struggled to balance his powers quickly resulting in mass destruction of area wherever he went. As he aged he ran into Diana someone he knew only from legends of her slaying the solari due to her supposed herracy. She trained him in using his lunar powers making him unleash his fury upon the tribes people of the solari for the execution and exile

He marched into the halls blood on both his zenith blade and moonsilver crescent, guards dead at the door, executioner got executed with a swift decapitation, he walked up to the leader of the solari and asked for his surrender if he declined blood would be shed and it would not be exodus’. The leader of the solari declined and a fight ensued 20:1 exodus swiftly removed all the attackers heads and limbs within seconds, knocking many unconscious, leaving nothing but a bloodstained rug and a leader fearing for his life. “surrender and give me the leadership so I can bring back the lunari and restore peace and order to this land” exodus said. The leader agreed, he handed leadership over to exodus and Diana quickly joined him at his side to be his wife and future queen of the lunari and solari tribes.

Exodus is a tank in solar form and an assassin in lunar form
Exodus has his ult at lvl 1 it doesn’t level up so each of his abilities (Q, W, E) have 6 ranks rather than 5

Abilities:

Passive – Cloud cover once every minute for 3 seconds exodus is unable to use any energy for his abilities however the regeneration level of his energy pools is multiplied by 4 for a total of 10 lunar/solar energy regeneration per second this inability to use energy prevents him from utilising his abilities he gains 35% movement speed for the duration of the passive effect

Q- Solar form

Zen Strike Cooldown 18/17/16/15/14/13 Seconds Cost 10/15/20/25/30/35 Solar energy

Exodus thrusts his zenith blade forward directly in front of him dealing 40/45/50/55/60/65 magic damage (+55% of ability power)

Q – Lunar form

Moonlit fists cooldown 27/25/23/20/18/15 Seconds cost 40/50/60/75/80/85 Lunar energy

He selects a target and punches them 5 times dealing 10/15/20/25/30/35 physical damage per punch (+5% of attack damage)

W – Quicksilver strike cooldown 30/30/25/20/15/10 seconds cost 85 lunar or solar energy (depending which form he is in)

1st activation – Dashes at 3 targets (similar to alpha strike) (prioritising champs but cannot hit the same target more than once per use of this ability) within 400 units of him marking them with light

2nd activation – Sets off light and depending on which form he is in has different effects

Solar form – the marks explode dealing 10/15/20/25/30/35 magic damage (+15% of ability power) giving the targets 3 seconds of burning damage dealing 1/3/5/7/9/11 True damage per second and slows them by 15% for the duration (symbolises heat exhaustion)

Lunar form – the marks illuminate the targets hit for 5 seconds revealing them (even if they activate a stealth after the 1st activation while) illuminated targets take 5/6/7/8/9/10% increased damage from exodus’ basic attacks and for the 1st second of the duration they are blinded

E – Solar form – Rally - cooldown 19/17/15/13/11/9 seconds cost 5/7/9/15/30/45 solar energy

Exodus rallies himself and his allies within 250 units giving himself 30 armour and magic resist for 3 seconds and giving his allies 20 armour and magic resist for 5 seconds

E – lunar form – Howl of the night – cooldown 27/24/21/18/15/12 seconds cost 5/7/8/20/30/50 lunar energy

Exodus howls out aloud and boosts the attack damage and armour penetration of himself and his allies within 300 units. Allied champs gain 10% attack damage and armour penetration for 2 seconds and boosts his own ability power and magic penetration by 15% for 3 seconds

R- night and day – cooldown 12.5 seconds no cost

Changes between lunar and solar form each form gives him different bonuses
In solar form he gains 5 armour and magic resist for each champion within 300 units of him

In lunar form he gains 5 attack damage and ability power for each champion within 30 units of him

Bonuses change when he switches forms

Edit 1
Changed from 0.55% on his solar form Q to 55%
Changed from 0.05% on his moonlit fist to 5%
Changed Solar form second activation of Quicksilver strike from 0.15% to 15%
